answers.answer: Sorry I had to answer here, I don't know what's wrong with the show more button
Oh man its hard I kno u will be there soon my 20 weeks went by fast thats a gd stage ..gd luck eat watermelon and try to walk everyday drink water
Thanks sweetie, I'm drinking a lot of water and walk and least 20 mins and day, I do get swollen in my hands sometimes, but I don't mind yet lol
Oh yea I hate that swollen hands ugh

I feel you.  I'm 28wks and already gained 25 lbs and i was over weight. I'm lucky not to have diabetes,  but do have mild blood pressure and anemic. I'm always swollen, tired,  and get back pains and back acid reflex.  I eat healthy and walk ten min a day bc i can't do more without getting cramps and dizzy spells, only drink water.  The weight doesnt seem to stay off, but dr says ok just eat smaller meals and advoid junk food,  sweets n sugary drinks

@mamabear oh sweetie, I've only gain 8 lbs so far and I am diabetic and have high blood pressure, and I can't walk too much because of my cerclage and it starts to hurt every time I walk more than 10 mins, but keep going like that and good luck to u

question: lexus3232 I'm 20 weeks, I was heavy when I got pregnant so now I'm heavier, I'm almost where u ladies are, but is not the same when ur that far along and feeling like u ladies feel, I wanna be there already lol
title: lexus3232
